ja.title: Tokyo Midtown Design Touch関連イベントでACTANT FORESTさんと協働で進めているComoris POTの展示が開催中です
ja.body:
Tokyo Midtown Design Touchの関連イベントとして開催中の「関係から考えるデザイン Systemic Design」でACTANT FOREST と協働で進めているソーシャルビジネスプランの土台となるアイディア，Comoris POT by ACTANT FORESTがコナラの可愛い苗と共に展示中です．
zeroinonはテクノロジー面から自然と人の共生に寄与できる未来づくりに貢献していきます．
展示は10月15日〜29日までです．

en.title: Comoris POT, which is being developed in collaboration with ACTANT FOREST, is now on display at the Tokyo Midtown Design Touch event.
en.body:
Comoris POT by ACTANT FOREST, an idea that forms the basis of a social business plan being developed in collaboration with ACTANT FOREST, is now on display with a cute Quercus serrata seedling at "Systemic Design", a related event of Tokyo Midtown Design Touch. 
Zeroinon will contribute to the creation of a future in which nature and people can coexist in harmony from a technological perspective.
The exhibition will be open from October 15 to 29.
